Portfolio

FlourPower

Description Developed with a team consisting of:
  • 1 Back End Dev
  • 1 Front End Dev
  • 1 iOS Dev
Project Build a recipe app which allows users to import recipes through a public API (Spoonacular) or through OCR technology (rtesseract). The recipes can be saved and viewed through the mobile device which has the capability of reading the recipes to you! Saved recipes are searchable by name or ingredient.
Role Back End Engineer
Tech ruby on rails, postgres, activerecord, bcrypt, heroku, minitest, bullet, rtesseract, httparty, paperclip, nokogiri, pg_search
github repo
user interface

OfficeHawk

Description Developed at a hackathon with a team consisting of:
  • 2 Back End Devs
  • 2 Front End Devs
  • 1 iOS Dev
Project Build an employee tracking app which allowed managers to track where their employees spend time in the office through the use of iBeacon technology.
Role Back End Engineer
Tech ruby on rails, postgres, activerecord, bcrypt, heroku, minitest
github repo
user interface
